title: Sun-blush tomato, red pepper and goat cheese pizzas
ingredients: ['4 pitta breads', '300g (11 oz) fresh goat cheese, crumbled', '200g (7 oz) jarred roasted red peppers, drained and chopped', '100g (4 oz) sun-blush tomatoes marinated in olive oil, drained and chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'good handful fresh basil leaves, torn', '100ml (4 fl oz) balsamic vinegar, or to taste']
